botan.math.bigint.divide

Division

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

void divide()(auto ref const BigInt x, auto ref const BigInt y_arg, ref BigInt q, ref BigInt r);
BigInt Division

Params:
BigInt x an integer
BigInt y_arg a non-zero integer
BigInt q will be set to x / y
BigInt r will be set to x % y
